courses.title: DCA (Diploma in Computer Applications)
courses.description: Learn the basics of computer applications, including MS Office, Internet, and fundamental IT concepts for everyday use.

courses.title: ADCA (Advanced Diploma in Computer Applications)
courses.description: Advanced training in computer applications covering MS Office, Tally, Internet, and basic programming for career enhancement.

courses.title: DTP (Desktop Publishing)
courses.description: Master publishing tools like CorelDRAW and Photoshop to design flyers, brochures, and creative layouts.

courses.title: MS Office
courses.description: Comprehensive training in Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook for personal and professional productivity.

courses.title: Photoshop
courses.description: Learn Adobe Photoshop from scratch to create, edit, and enhance images with professional-grade skills.

courses.title: Video Editing
courses.description: Create professional videos using tools like Adobe Premiere Pro and Filmora, from trimming to transitions and effects.

courses.title: CCC (Course on Computer Concepts)
courses.description: Government-certified course to build foundational computer knowledge and skills for office and everyday use.

courses.title: Web Development (HTML, CSS, JS)
courses.description: Build websites from scratch using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Ideal for beginners looking to enter web development.

courses.title: Advanced Excel
courses.description: Master Excel tools like formulas, pivot tables, charts, and data analysis for business and professional use.

courses.title: Accounting with Tally
courses.description: Learn computerized accounting using Tally software including GST, vouchers, ledgers, and reports.

courses.title: COPA (Computer Operator and Programming Assistant)
courses.description: ITI-level course focused on computer operations, typing, MS Office, internet, and basic programming.

courses.title: Python Programming
courses.description: Beginner-friendly Python programming course covering syntax, logic building, and small projects.

courses.title: Typing Course
courses.description: Improve your typing speed and accuracy with practical exercises and typing software.
